propDescriptions.ampmInClock: Display ampm controls under the clock (instead of in the toolbar).
propDescriptions.className: Class name applied to the root element.
propDescriptions.closeOnSelect: If true the popup or dialog will immediately close after submitting full date.
propDescriptions.componentsProps: The props used for each component slot.
propDescriptions.defaultValue: The default value. Used when the component is not controlled.
propDescriptions.disabled: If true, the picker and text field are disabled.
propDescriptions.disableFuture: If true disable values before the current time
propDescriptions.disableIgnoringDatePartForTimeValidation: Do not ignore date part when validating min/max time.
propDescriptions.disablePast: If true disable values after the current time.
propDescriptions.inputFormat: Format of the date when rendered in the input(s).
propDescriptions.inputRef: Pass a ref to the input element.
propDescriptions.label: The label content.
propDescriptions.maxTime: Max time acceptable time. For input validation date part of passed object will be ignored if disableIgnoringDatePartForTimeValidation not specified.
propDescriptions.minTime: Min time acceptable time. For input validation date part of passed object will be ignored if disableIgnoringDatePartForTimeValidation not specified.
propDescriptions.onAccept:
Callback fired when date is accepted @DateIOType.

Signature:
function(value: TValue) => void
value: The value that was just accepted.
propDescriptions.onChange:
Callback fired when the value (the selected date) changes.

Signature:
function(value: TValue) => void
value: The new value.
propDescriptions.onClose: Callback fired when the popup requests to be closed. Use in controlled mode (see open).
propDescriptions.onError:
Callback that fired when input value or new value prop validation returns new validation error (or value is valid after error). In case of validation error detected reason prop return non-null value and TextField must be displayed in error state. This can be used to render appropriate form error.
Read the guide about form integration and error displaying.

Signature:
function(reason: TError, value: TValue) => void
reason: The reason why the current value is not valid.
value: The invalid value.
propDescriptions.onOpen: Callback fired when the popup requests to be opened. Use in controlled mode (see open).
propDescriptions.onSelectedSectionsChange:
Callback fired when the selected sections change.

Signature:
function(newValue: FieldSelectedSections) => void
newValue: The new selected sections.
propDescriptions.onViewChange:
Callback fired on view change.

Signature:
function(view: View) => void
view: The new view.
propDescriptions.open: Control the popup or dialog open state.
propDescriptions.selectedSections: The currently selected sections. This prop accept four formats: 1. If a number is provided, the section at this index will be selected. 2. If an object with a startIndex and endIndex properties are provided, the sections between those two indexes will be selected. 3. If a string of type MuiDateSectionName is provided, the first section with that name will be selected. 4. If null is provided, no section will be selected If not provided, the selected sections will be handled internally.
propDescriptions.shouldDisableTime:
Dynamically check if time is disabled or not. If returns false appropriate time point will ot be acceptable.

Signature:
function(timeValue: number, view: ClockPickerView) => boolean
timeValue: The value to check.
view: The clock type of the timeValue.
returns (boolean): Returns true if the time should be disabled

slotDescriptions.InputAdornment: Component disabled on the start or end input adornment used to open the picker.
slotDescriptions.ActionBar: The action bar placed bellow picker views.
slotDescriptions.PaperContent: The content of the Paper wrapping views.
slotDescriptions.OpenPickerIcon: Icon displayed in the open picker button.
slotDescriptions.SwitchViewButton: Button displayed to switch between different calendar views.
slotDescriptions.SwitchViewIcon: Icon displayed in the SwitchViewButton. Rotated by 180Â° when the open view is 'year'.
slotDescriptions.PreviousIconButton: Button allowing to switch to the left view.
slotDescriptions.NextIconButton: Button allowing to switch to the right view.
slotDescriptions.LeftArrowIcon: Icon displayed in the left view switch button.
slotDescriptions.RightArrowIcon: Icon displayed in the right view switch button.
slotDescriptions.Day: Custom component for day. Check the PickersDay component.
